biotools.summary: PharmacoDB allows scientists to search across publicly available datasets to find instances where a compound or cell line of interest has been profiled, and to view and compare the dose-response data for a specific cell line - compound pair from any of the studies included in the database

bioschemas.name: PharmacoDB
